entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
